title: Basketball Free-Throw Success Rate Analysis and Strategic Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic basketball rules and foundational understanding of statistical concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment for office/administrative professionals, conducting language curriculum-linked projects

learning_goals: Learners can analyze historical trends in basketball free-throw success rates (75% average vs. 79% exceptional cases).
Learners can explain the impact of environmental factors (presence/absence of spectators) on athletic performance based on data.
Learners cultivate the ability to compare home/away game data, determine statistical significance, and write reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
